**Using <LastLocation>**

```js { "fakeBrowser": true }
<React.Fragment>
  <LastLocation>
      {({ lastLocation, lastLocationDistinct }) => {
        if (!lastLocation) {
          return <em>No last Location</em>;
        }
        return (
          <div>
            <strong>Last Location:</strong> {lastLocation.pathname}<br/>
            <strong>Last Location (distinct):</strong> {lastLocationDistinct.pathname}<br/>
          </div>
        );
      }}
  </LastLocation>
  <ul>
    <li><Link to="/link1/">Link 1</Link></li>
    <li><Link to="/link2/">Link 2</Link></li>
    <li><Link to="/link3/">Link 3</Link></li>
  </ul>
</React.Fragment>
```

**Using withLastLocation**

```js { "fakeBrowser": true }

const MyComponent = withLastLocation(({ lastLocation, lastLocationDistinct }) => {
    if (!lastLocation) {
      return <em>No last Location</em>;
    }
    return (
      <div>
        <strong>Last Location:</strong> {lastLocation.pathname}<br/>
        <strong>Last Location (distinct):</strong> {lastLocationDistinct.pathname}<br/>
      </div>
    );
});


<React.Fragment>
  <MyComponent />
  <ul>
    <li><Link to="/link1/">Link 1</Link></li>
    <li><Link to="/link2/">Link 2</Link></li>
    <li><Link to="/link3/">Link 3</Link></li>
  </ul>
</React.Fragment>
```
